Uses of Package
fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align

Packages that use fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align
fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align   
 

Classes in fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align used by fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align
AlignerConsumer
          An "aligner consumer" is a class that takes as input the output from the InputReader (which depends on the AnnotatedTextReader).
AlignmentException
          Simple exception class for this package.
AnnotatedTextReader
          Main class in the package.
FilterTokenAndAnnot
          An object can implement this interface to filter special cases in SimpleTokenByLineReader and SimpleTaggedTextReader.
InputReader
          The InputReader is responsible for reading the reference (input) text.
TagPositionConsumer.AnnotationReceiver
          Interface to communicate with the actual final consumer, which knows what to do with the annotations.
